descriptions.description: Libtasn1 is the ASN.1 library used by GnuTLS, GNU Shishi and some other packages. It has been shipped as part of GnuTLS for some time but is now a GNU package.

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract libtasn1-3.3.tar.gz configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --disable-gtk-doc --disable-gtk-doc-pdf --disable-gtk-doc-html --enable-shared --enable-static make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive libtasn1-3.3
